text: The glomerular filtrate contains the following substances except?
explanation:
Glomerularfiltration is the first step in making urine. It is the process that your kidneys use to filter excess fluid and waste products out of the blood.
Glomerular filtratecontains a lot of water, but also important molecules like glucose, amino acids, salts and excretory material, urea.

text: Which of the following groups of compounds are products of the light stage of photosynthesis? I. Ribulose bi-phosphate (RuBP) II. Nicotin amide di-phosphorous (NADPH2) III. Oxygen (O 2) IV. Adenosine Triphosphate (ATP)
explanation: In the light reactions, energy from sunlight drives the synthesis of ATP( Adenosine triphosphate) and NADPH(Nicotinamide di-phosphorus), coupled to the formation of \(O_2\) from \(H_2O\)

text: Which of the following is an example of discontinuous variation?

options.A: the range in height of a pea plant from 30cm to 50cm
options.B: Offspring, including the two male cats and three female cats
options.C: the colour of pear plants grown in the dark
options.D: the adult body weight ranging from 50 kg t0 95 kg

explanation:
A characteristic of any species with only a limited number of possible values shows discontinuous variation (i.e It can only be a discrete number of values). Human blood group is an example of discontinuous variation. In the ABO blood group system, only four blood groups are possible (A, B, AB or O). There are no values in between, so this is discontinuous variation.
Here are some examples: blood group, sex (male or female), eye color etc.
